item.title: Dreaming in Cherry Blossoms, I Fall in Love with You launches in June
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/dreaming-in-cherry-blossoms-i-fall-in-love-with-you-launches-in-june

  • PC
  • Switch

Voice cast announced.

Romance visual novel Dreaming in Cherry Blossoms, I Fall in Love with You will launch for Switch and PC via Steam in June, developer Operahouse announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

The game’s voice cast was also announced:

Cherry (voiced by Rin Kurusu)

Wathy (voiced by Saku Mizuno)

Yuri Takai (voicd by Yurina Uchiyama)

Shoko Ina (voiced by Non Harusaki)

Yua Orihara (voiced by Manatsu Murakami)

Hayato Kusanagi (voiced by Kakeru Hatano)

And more…!

Here is the story synopsis:

A story where the “memories of cherry blossoms” gently unravel the heart.

It is a tale of a person encountering “everyday life” once again in a quiet season.​

A visual novel set in a small town where fantasy and reality intersect, quietly touching the heart.

In the changing scenery, as if searching for something that once certainly existed.​

Eventually, it becomes a journey to face forgotten emotions once more.​

Within the game, graphics enveloped in soft light and delicate sounds color the story.

Multiple “forms of the heart” are depicted based on the player’s choices.​

Feelings that everyone has experienced at least once but couldn’t express in words—.

Find the answer within the spring breeze.

item.title: Digimon Expo ’25 set for September 20 to 21
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/digimon-expo-25-set-for-september-20-to-21

Details to be announced on June 26.

Bandai Namco will host Digimon Expo ’25 from September 20 to 21 at Prism Hall in Tokyo Dome City, the company announced.

The in-person event will bring together all things Digimon, including the anime, video games, card game, and merchandise.

Detailed information about Digimon Expo ’25 will be announced on June 26.
